## Lyrical Topic Modeling (Taylorâ€™s Version)


# Project Overview
This project analyzes Taylor Swift's song lyrics, identifies themes and emotional vibes of her entire discography, and segregate into groups that give the same vibe. The entire process includes web scraping, data cleaning, topic modeling with LDA, sentiment analysis, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard for visualization.


# Reference Links

- Link to Taylor Swift's page on Genius: https://genius.com/artists/Taylor-swift/songs

- Link to Taylor Swift's discography page on Discogs: https://www.discogs.com/artist/1124645-Taylor-Swift?srsltid=AfmBOopvo-xhBkd1-xg3RZqGElU9XPKbymXsIg4dAH7rqqrkA-y5m7W- 



# Project Structure

* pw_get_links.py - Scrapes song links from Genius

    - Uses Playwright to navigate and scroll through Taylor Swift's song catalog
 
    - Extracts song titles and URLs
  
    - Saves data to CSV format as ts_songs_link1.csv


* pw_get_lyrics.py - Scrapes lyrics from individual song pages

    - Uses Playwright to iterate through collected links in ts_songs_link1.csv 
    
    - Fetches complete lyrics, song name, and link to the page.

    - Saves lyrics data to CSV as ts_tw_lyrics1.csv


* scrape_album.py - Scrapes album name and tracklist from Discogs

    - Uses Playwright to iterate throught the each album page 

    - Collects album names, release dates, and track listings

    - Saves album metadata to CSV for later merging with lyrics data as albums.csv


* data_cleaning.qmd - Data wranging, cleaning, and merging

    - Cleans and preprocessing scraped lyrics data from ts_tw_lyrics1.csv
    
    - Merges lyrics from ts_tw_lyrics1.csv with album data from using albums.csv using rapidfuzzy matching 
    
    - Final dataset saved to CSV as final_dataset.csv


* topic_modeling.qmd - Data wrangin, cleaning, and merging

    - Lyrics preprocessing and cleaning

    - Topic modeling using LDA with 11 topics
    
    - Sentiment analysis using Hugging Face transformers
    
    - Topic interpretation and naming


* streamlit_app.py - Interactive dashboard

    - Visualizes topic distributions
    
    - Explores songs by topic
    
    - Displays sentiment analysis results
    
    - Interactive filtering and exploration



# Running the Project:

* Data Collection:

    - Step 1: Get song links from Genius
      Python run pw_get_links.py

    - Step 2: Get album metadata from Discogs
      Python run scrape_album.py

    - Step 3: Get lyrics for each song
      Python run pw_get_lyrics.py


* Data Analysis:

    - Step 4: Run data cleaning and merging from data_clenaing.qmd

    - Step 5: Follow the steps in topic_modeling.qmd


* Visualizing:

    - Step 6: Get streamlit file running
      Python run streamlit_app.py

    - Step 7: Open the streamlit app with this commond in the terminal:
      python3 -m streamlit run app.py
      https://cherisa-bajracharya-taylor-swift-modeling-app-cjfhck.streamlit.app/


# Outputs

    - Raw Data: CSV files with song links, lyrics, and metadata
    
    - Processed Dataset: Cleaned and merged dataset with topics and sentiment scores
    
    - Interactive Dashboard: Web-based visualization tool
    
    - Topic Models: Trained LDA model with topic-word distributions
